name: Apollo.io
headline: Apollo is the foundation of your entire go-to-market strategy.
description:
Founded in 2015, Apollo.io is a lead intelligence and sales engagement platform trusted by nearly 9,000 paying customers, from rapidly growing startups to some of the largest global enterprises. Our community-based approach to crowdsourcing data gives users maximum coverage while ensuring data accuracy. Our advanced algorithms and unique data acquisition methods help over 500,000 sales professionals enrich and analyze prospects' data to increase quality conversations and opportunities.

We have notable investors: Y Combinator and Nexus Venture Partners. We recently completed a Series B financing to fuel our next growth phase. We have reached and maintained profitability for the last 18 months.

Our growth and customer feedback set us apart from competitors.  Apollo had over one million sign-ups for its platform in the past year, and the number of weekly active users increased by over 400%.  We are a top-ranking G2 Crowd vendor in the Sales Intelligence, Lead Intelligence, Marketing Account Intelligence, and Sales Engagement categories.  Our highest scores are in the B2B data space for accuracy and ROI based on customer reviews.
generated_description:
**Apollo.io: The Go-To-Market Powerhouse**

Founded in 2015 and hailing from the tech hub of San Francisco, Apollo.io has quickly made a name for itself as a leading sales engagement and lead intelligence platform. Its mission? To be the cornerstone of your go-to-market strategy. Think of Apollo as the trusted co-pilot guiding sellers through the complexities of finding and connecting with the right prospects.

**What Makes Apollo Stand Out**

With a community-driven approach, Apollo boasts a robust database that taps into the collective knowledge of users, ensuring data accuracy and expansive reach. Currently, the platform supports over 500,000 sales professionals who leverage its advanced algorithms for enriching and analyzing prospect data. This capability translates into more impactful conversations and increased sales opportunities.

Apollo's impressive track record includes supporting nearly 9,000 paying customers, ranging from nimble startups to Fortune 500 giants. The company has maintained profitability over the last 18 months and recently completed a Series B financing round, thanks in part to notable investors like Y Combinator and Nexus Venture Partners.

**Growth at Scale**

In the past year alone, Apollo has seen over one million sign-ups, with weekly active users jumping by more than 400%. It has emerged as a top contender in categories like Sales Intelligence and Lead Intelligence on G2 Crowd, with exceptional ratings for accuracy and return on investment (ROI) according to customer reviews.

**A Comprehensive Suite of Tools**

Apollo’s platform boasts a myriad of features designed to streamline every facet of the sales process. From advanced Contact & Account Search and Inbound Optimization to powerful Sales Engagement and Deal Management tools, Apollo covers it all. Sales teams can effortlessly schedule meetings, analyze conversations, and gain meaningful insights through Analytics.

- **Build Pipeline**: Find leads and optimize inbound strategy.
- **Close Deals**: Manage pipelines with efficiency.
- **Improve Performance**: Use analytics and coaching to enhance sales strategies.
- **Streamline Operations**: Automate tasks and enrich CRM data seamlessly.

**Why Apollo?**

Apollo is not just another tool; it's a transformative platform for organizations seeking a competitive edge in sales. With features powered by AI and an ever-expanding data network, Apollo is positioned to help teams not only meet but exceed their sales numbers.

As Michael Seibel from Y Combinator notes, Apollo is a critical asset for organizations seeking to unify their sales and marketing efforts under one roof—saving time, cutting costs, and boosting overall effectiveness.

In summary, if you're in the market for a tool that delivers data accuracy and powerful sales engagement features, look no further than Apollo.io. This platform is your gateway to optimizing your sales strategy and driving meaningful growth.

For more information, check them out at [Apollo.io](https://www.apollo.io/).
